articles.title: Asia's Rising Scientists: Andreia Carrillo - Asian Scientist Magazine
articles.description: Fascinated by our galaxy’s 13 billion-year history, Dr Andreia Carrillo is using stars as fossils to understand the Milky Way while helping foster a growing community of Filipino astrophysicists.
articles.content:

articles.title: Suddenly everyone is hunting for alternatives to the US dollar - The Edge Markets MY
articles.description: Smaller nations, including at least a dozen in Asia, are also experimenting with de-dollarization. And corporates around the world are selling an unprecedented portion of their debt in local currencies, wary of further dollar strength.(Dec 22): King Dollar is…

articles.title: Salt Bae touched the World Cup trophy after Argentina win, gets criticised online - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The Turkish chef was seen kissing the trophy, hoisting it above his head and striking his familiar pose of pretending to sprinkle salt on it.
articles.content: Salt Bae, the Turkish chef famous for his salt sprinkling prowess, is facing criticism for handling the World Cup trophy as he stood on the pitch with the Argentina squad as they celebrated their win… [+390 chars]
